pkgmetadata.longdescription: =========mitocyto=========Image analysis software for detecting cells in serial sections and summarising intensity in each cell across multiple channels. Includes automatic segementation and gui-based manual segmentation workflows.Source code and documentation on GitHub: `https://github.com/CnrLwlss/mitocyto <https://github.com/CnrLwlss/mitocyto/>`_.Contributors============`Conor Lawless <http://cnr.lwlss.net/>`_
